title: How the Fallout From Andrew Cuomo’s Resignation Spread to Jeff Zucker - The New York Times
content:
1. How the Fallout From Andrew Cuomo’s Resignation Spread to Jeff Zucker  The New York Times
  2. CNN insider says network 'needs to step up and fire Brian Stelter' for not exposing Jeff Zucker affair: report  Fox News
  3. ‘Joined at the Hip’: Jeff Zucker’s Relationship With a Top CNN Executive  The New York Times
  4. Why is trust in media plummeting? Just look at what’s happening at CNN  The Guardian
  5. Joe Concha: Jeff Zucker's CNN exit leaves more questions than answers  Fox News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Chris Cuomo and Mr. Zucker, the former CNN president, are among those whose careers have suffered in the year since the former governor was first accused of sexual harassment.
